name: RandomAnimalFactsFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Random Animal Facts Flash Briefing contains over 155 different animals and over 2000 total unique facts! 
They are constantly updated and improved.
You will hear a different one every time you play your flash briefing and definitely make for a great conversation starter.
These facts are also perfect for kids! They're appropriate, educational, and sparks creativity and thought in children.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
